sentences.en: Happy is the house that shelters a friend! It might well be built, like a festal bower or arch, to entertain him a single day.
sentences.cn: 快乐是朋友定居的房子！它将会被建造，像一个节日的凉亭或者护拱，是他每一个孤单的日子的港湾。

sentences.en: Spring carry is the most scale collective on the world migrates, unique festal landscape.
sentences.cn: 春运是世界上最大规模的集体迁徙, 独一无二的节日景观.

sentences.en: Sweet sweet lake goes vacationing village and streamers , send festal atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 香蜜湖度假村里张灯结彩, 一派节日气氛.

sentences.en: The whole town is in a festal mood.
sentences.cn: 全镇沉浸在节日的气氛之中。
